title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 1 - Single Species
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 1 - Single Species

State Regulations
§ 1.10 - Repealed
§ 1.11 - Deer hunting seasons
§ 1.13 - Deer management focus areas

Deer (§ 1.16 to 1.30)

Bear (§ 1.31 to 1.32)

Wild Turkey (§ 1.40 to 1.41)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 1

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301,11-0303, 11-0713, 11-0901, 11-0907, 11-0929, 11-0933, arts. 11, 13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
